DOC.brief_summary: The purpose VIVO Clinical Study evaluate safety effectiveness Zilver® Vena™ Venous Stent treatment symptomatic iliofemoral venous outflow obstruction .
DOC.criteria: symptomatic venous outflow obstruction one iliofemoral venous segment ( i.e. , one limb ) per patient , demonstrate : CEAP `` C '' ≥ 3 , VCSS pain score ≥ 2 < 18 year age ; pregnant planning become pregnant next 12 month ; plan surgical interventional procedure target limb ( except thrombolysis and/or thrombectomy preparation procedure vena cava filter placement prior stent implantation patient high risk pulmonary embolism ) within 30 day prior time study procedure ; plan surgical interventional procedure medical condition ( i.e. , associate target limb ) within 30 day prior study procedure ; lesion intend treatment length extend inferior vena cava level lesser trochanter ; lesion malignant obstruction ; previous stenting target vessel ; iliofemoral venous segment unsuitable treatment available size study device .
